T02TD3258E:16b-1: dhva dz'a gra ke y'ur s'a dha nam /
T02TD3258E:16b-3: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyang gi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3258E:16b-4: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dbung rgyan sku mdog nag mo zhal gsum phyag bzhi ma'o //
T02TD3258E:16b-5: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni dmar mo dang ljang gu'o //
T02TD3258E:16b-6: ral gri dang zhags pa bsnams pa ni g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis so //
T02TD3258E:16b-7: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga dang 'khor lo ni g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na ste sgra kham ser gyen du gyur pa /
T02TD3258E:16b-8: dbu la thod pa skam po lngas rgyan du mdzad pa stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD3258E:16b-9: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs par gyur pa gsus pa 'phyang bar gyur pa g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od zer can te /
T02TD3258E:16b-10: stod shag ser po mnabs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD3258E:16b-11: sa bon ni h'um dang dbu rgyan la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3258E:16b-12: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs aa bha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
